description: Sophia Lynn is a sweet blond girl next door type who wants a new kinky experience. She strolls through the fetish halls looking at the shackles, whips, the spraying water towers…nothing seems quite right. Until she strolls past the machines in the sci-fi set and her curiosity takes over. The Black Magic gets her started but it’s The dragon where she gets pounded until she jumps off the machine.
title: This machine is just right....
